description: [RCSession](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0662) can launch itself from a hollowed svchost.exe process.(Citation: Secureworks BRONZE PRESIDENT December 2019)(Citation: Trend Micro DRBControl February 2020)(Citation: Profero APT27 December 2020)
